Content: Orion protectorate: The player guides the young republic trough its
rise to a regional power. The player has to design ships, manage long
term research and engage in diplomacy to incorporate the neighbouring
polities. The player should be free to achieve supermacy by military or
diplomatic means. The individual missions would be presented in the
from of ambitions (so it is one continiuos savegame, but some regions
may be added on the fly).
